An unusual new genus of Scenopinidae, Iranotrichia gen. n., comprising two newly discovered species (Iranotrichia insolitasp. n. and Iranotrichia nigrasp. n.), is described from Iran. Two new species of the genus Empidideicus Becker, 1907 from northern Iran
Article
Full-text available
  • Jan 2011
  • Babak Gharali
  • Neal Evenhuis
  • Hossein Lotfalizadeh
Two new species, Empidideicus aurantiacus Gharali & Evenhuis, sp. nov. and Empidideicus unicus Gharali & Evenhuis, sp. nov. are described and illustrated from the north of Iran. An updated key to species of Empidideicus in Iran and northern neighboring countries is presented.

Extension of the known range of the genus Spazigaster (Diptera: Syrphidae) to Iran
Article
Full-text available
  • Jun 2010
  • Babak Gharali
  • M. Reemer
The genus Spazigaster Rondani, 1843 is recorded for the first time from Iran based on three specimens collected in northern Iran. Specimens were identified as S. ambulans (Fabricius, 1798). Diagnostic features of the genus, its classification and distribution are discussed briefly.
